text: The Canada Cup was an international ice hockey tournament that was held five times from 1976 to 1991. Canada won the Cup four out of five times, and the Soviet Union won it once. ==Competitions== Year Champion Runner-up Semi- finalists MVP 1976 N/A (round-robin system) Bobby Orr 1981 and Vladislav Tretiak 1984 and John Tonelli 1987 and Wayne Gretzky 1991 and Bill Ranford ==References== * MÃ¼ller, Stephan : International Ice Hockey Encyclopedia 1904-2005 / BoD GmbH Norderstedt, 2005 Category:Ice hockey competitions
title: Canada Cup
